slide1.title: Transforming Lives Through Sports
slide1.subtitle: Developing talents and character through sports practice

slide2.subtitle: More than capoeira: a home of dreams, education and opportunities for our children

slide3.title: Every child deserves to flourish

hero.description: At Anaj√¥ NGO, we believe every child deserves opportunities to grow, learn and dream. Join us in this mission to transform communities.

about.title: About Anaj√¥ Association
about.description: Learn about our history, our team and our passion for transforming lives through sports, education and culture.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To act for local development, strengthening and qualifying support actions for children, adolescents, families and communities in situations of social vulnerability.

objective.title: Main Objective
objective.description: To promote healthy development and comprehensive education of children and adolescents, creating conditions to expand self-esteem, citizenship and joy through qualified activities in safe and humanized environments.

joseilda.name: Maria Joseilda Ferreira de Brito
joseilda.role: Coordinator and President of Anaj√¥ Association

founding.label: Foundation
founding.text: Anaj√¥ Association was officially founded on January 15, 2007.

founder.label: Founder
founder.text: Created by Hailton da Silva (Master Hayu), capoeira master of the IDEAL CAPOEIRA group.

motivation.label: Motivation
motivation.text: Born from the founder's sensitivity to experiencing poverty and vulnerability of children, adolescents and families in the city of Guarabira (PB).

beginning.label: The Beginning
beginning.text: The project started as a safe space offered through the art and cultural heritage of capoeira. The Ideal Capoeira Brasil group has been following and sponsoring the initiative since 2000.

partnership.label: International Partnership
partnership.text: The association was established through a Brazilian-Austrian partnership, which resulted in the creation of the "Kinderhilfswerk Anaj√¥ Austria" organization in Austria.

mission.label: Our Mission
mission.text: To act for local development, strengthening and qualifying support actions for children, adolescents, families and communities in situations of social vulnerability.

objective.label: Main Objective
objective.text: To promote healthy development and comprehensive education of children and adolescents, creating conditions to expand self-esteem, citizenship and joy through qualified activities in safe and humanized environments.

impact.label: Social Impact
impact.text: To act in combating child labor and preventing sexual exploitation of children and adolescents in the region where the association is located.

belief.label: Our Belief
belief.text: We believe that everyone, adults and children, have creative capacities and potential. We act to help them find answers to their questions, valuing their own knowledge.

target.label: Target Audience
target.text: We serve a total of 140 children and adolescents.

families.label: Family Profile
families.text: The project benefits children of small farmers, sharecroppers, factory workers, domestic workers and textile industry workers, informal workers and unemployed.

support.label: Family Support
support.text: We extend our service to family members (parents and siblings) with punctual or regular support, offering conflict mediation and encouraging respectful dialogue.

city.label: City
city.text: Guarabira, the ninth most populous city in Para√≠ba, located 98 km from the capital, Jo√£o Pessoa.

anajo1.label: ANAJ√î I (Headquarters)
anajo1.text: Our main educational center is located in the Northeast I and II neighborhoods, a region with 20,000 inhabitants.

anajo2.label: ANAJ√î II
anajo2.text: A branch in the Ros√°rio neighborhood (5,000 inhabitants), where we offer capoeira, maculel√™ and school reinforcement classes twice a week.

anajo3.label: ANAJ√î III
anajo3.text: Another branch in the Cordeiro neighborhood, with capoeira and dance classes once a week.

anajo4.label: ANAJ√î IV
anajo4.text: A nucleus in the Mutir√£o neighborhood, with activities on Saturdays.

proposal.label: Pedagogical Proposal
proposal.text: We offer free workshops in the opposite shift as an alternative for promoting comprehensive education, citizenship, social inclusion and guarantee of rights.

culture.label: Art and Culture
culture.text: Music classes (guitar and recorder), dance, maculel√™, theater, arts and crafts.

instruments.label: Instrument Workshop
instruments.text: We encourage the making of their own musical instruments, such as berimbau, pandeiro and atabaque.

city.label: Guarabira City Hall
city.text: Supports the association with a monthly budget since May 2019.

police.label: 4th Battalion of the Military Police of Para√≠ba
police.text: Establishes a partnership for weekly music, jiu-jitsu and kickboxing workshops at ANAJ√î I headquarters.

capoeira.label: Ideal Capoeira Brasil
capoeira.text: The founder's capoeira group supports the project from the beginning, helping with project implementation and teaching Afro-Brazilian culture.

austria.label: Kinderhilfswerk Anaj√¥ Austria and Ideal Capoeira Europa
austria.text: Partner organizations in Austria that provide fundamental financial support for the construction of the physical space, purchase of equipment and maintenance of resources. They also work on raising awareness in European society and fundraising.

address.title: Address
address.text:
Pra√ßa do Encontro - Nordeste II
Guarabira - PB, 58200-000

hours.title: Operating Hours
hours.text:
Monday to Friday: 8am to 6pm
Saturdays: 8am to 12pm
Sundays: Closed

capacity.title: Capacity
capacity.text: We serve up to 140 children and youth simultaneously

flexibility.description: Choose how and when to contribute, respecting your availability and lifestyle.

mission.title: Who We Are
mission.subtitle: Anaj√¥ NGO was born from the dream of transforming realities through sport, education and culture. Each project is a seed of hope planted in the heart of the community.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To act for local development, strengthening and qualifying support actions for children, adolescents, families and communities in situations of social vulnerability.

objective.title: Main Objective
objective.description: To promote healthy development and comprehensive education of children and adolescents, creating conditions to expand self-esteem, citizenship and joy through qualified activities in safe and humanized environments.

belief.title: Our Belief
belief.description: We believe that everyone, adults and children, have creative capacities and potential. We act to help them find answers to their questions, valuing their own knowledge.

impact.title: Social Impact
impact.description: To act in combating child labor and preventing sexual exploitation of children and adolescents in the region where the association is located.

mission.quote: Every child who goes through our projects takes with them not only knowledge, but the certainty that their dreams are possible and valid.

projects.title: Our Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: Learn about some of the projects that are transforming lives and building a better future for our community.

supporters.subtitle: Meet the companies and individuals who believe in our cause and help us build a better future.

capoeira.title: Capoeira Classes
capoeira.description: Capoeira classes for children and adolescents, developing motor, cognitive, and social skills.

football.description: Football training for children and teenagers, developing technical, tactical skills and values such as discipline, respect and teamwork.

jiujitsu.description: Jiu-Jitsu classes for children and teenagers, developing motor, cognitive, social skills and self-defense.

tutoring.description: Educational support for children with learning difficulties in mathematics and Portuguese, with playful and personalized methodology.
results: High approval rate in the school year
